sentences.sentence: The value of America, India and China increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2013; while Japan decrease greatly with steady steps between 2010 and 2013.

sentences.sentence: The value of America, India and China increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2013; while Japan decrease greatly with steady steps between 2010 and 2013.
